review: I would like to give this product four or five stars, but upon receiving the product, I discovered that SD is not an option when streaming through Fire TV. I should have done more homework. We have a slow internet connect, so were streaming SD versions of items available on Amazon through my laptop, which worked great. Cannot do this through Fire TV, according to the help chat I just completed. I can adjust the setting to stream at a lower quality to prevent constant buffering,  but my only purchase option will be HD, so I'm paying the higher price still. I do not have a higher speed internet option in my rural area, so this is disappointing. Hoping Amazon will consider updating this product to allow for the SD streaming purchase option.
